channel.title: work on Maurício Antunes
channel.description: Recent content in work on Maurício Antunes

item.title: First day at Globo.com
item.description: New job, new challenges Today was my first day at globo.com It was awesome! I learned a lot of stuff today and had so many friendly welcome messages coming from my coworkers. I hope I can help the people there to evolve, learning and teaching with them.

item.title: Your environment is ruining your work
item.description: You may not notice but your environment is ruining your work. Every noise, every interruption or even parallel conversations are slowing down your productivity. Which is a bad thing because it is related to your happiness at your job. Understanding the problem Ok, you get up early and go to your job. You say “good morning” to your coleagues, get some coffee, seat, turn on your computer and yay, you are working.
